data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. É loozu ga kɔnigiti. Davide ná-kidafaawui.
Ee, GALA, woilo nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi ma,
Ɠida nà-faiti bu, è gòoɠaaʋote!
sìli nuiti daawooi maaʋele ma,
Zìi ɠa ɓalizu kòozu,
Dualuagi ta sasuɓalii naati ta kpɔ̀lɔzu,
Gè ɠɛ ma: «Nà pɔ ga gè koʋe sɔlɔɔ, ga poopogi ɠɛʋele,
Wɛlɛ, nà ʋela gè li ɠoozama,
Nà ʋelazu ʋagɔ zɔlɔɔ ga suvilɛ,
Faazupui lɔ ti zaama, Màliɠii,
ti ziɛzu kpidii ta foloi siɠigiti ga,
Faa zuɠoloɠologi nɔ ɠa é ɠɛɛzu siɠigi naa zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ sìli nu laade, é ʋa ɠɛ ɓaaɠulazu mà,
Kɛlɛ ɗa ʋe, è ga zunui ga nɔ̀un kɛʋele,
Dɛi de ɠɛa ɓɔni dɔɔɠuzu vaiti ma,
Saai ɠula ti viliba!
Nɔ̀un nà, nà kpee loozu GALA goizu,
Kpɔkɔ, sobu ta folo gaalɔgai,
Toɠa ziilɛigi veezu bɛ̀, é zɛ̀nvui unmɔɔ,
GALA ka gòomɛni é ti ɠaayei.
Zunui naa ɠa laalɛɛzu seiɲɔɠɔiti kpein bu,
Daaʋɛ ʋagɛ nɔnɔ vukɔi ʋa,
È-maavaiti zɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya,
Ee, GALA, ɗa ti yei zeɠezaɠai ɓomaʋɛ,
